recipes.title: Crispy Parmesan Carrot Sticks
recipes.notes: Roasted carrots with parm; good side.

recipes.title: Coq au Champagne
recipes.notes: Rich chicken; check GF subs for flour if any.

recipes.title: Sheet Pan Sesame Miso Chicken and Coconut Rice
recipes.notes: Use GF soy sauce/miso for Kale.

recipes.title: Crispy Buffalo Chicken Lettuce Wraps
recipes.notes: Use GF breading or skip flour.

recipes.title: Lemon Dill Salad
recipes.notes: Good light side.

recipes.title: Satisfying Salads
recipes.notes: Multiple salad ideas; check ingredients for GF.

recipes.title: Greek-Inspired Chicken Wings with Feta Dipping Sauce
recipes.notes: Use GF seasoning; dairy in feta dip.

recipes.title: One-Pan Mexican Chicken and Rice
recipes.notes: From The Defined Dish. Chicken thighs, aromatics, rice, tomato paste, broth, Rotel. GF-friendly if broth/paste are GF. Optional toppings: avocado, radish, jalapeño, green onion, lime.

recipes.title: Enchiladas con Carne (Paleo Beef Enchiladas)
recipes.notes: Beef + green chiles/onion filling, grain-free tortillas, homemade enchilada sauce with ghee/arrowroot/chili powder mix. GF/grain-free; dairy-free if skipping cheese.

recipes.title: Fattoush Salad with Creamy Feta Dressing
recipes.notes: Little Gem/romaine + Persian cucumbers + tomatoes + red onion + dill/mint/parsley; toasted pita for crunch; creamy feta dressing (olive oil, feta, garlic, vinegar, Dijon, honey, oregano, salt/pepper).

recipes.title: Crispy Buffalo Chicken Lettuce Wraps with Blue Cheese Sauce
recipes.notes: Panko/cassava-breaded chicken tenders fried and tossed in Frank's-style Buffalo; served in lettuce cups with blue cheese sauce (Greek yogurt + blue cheese + lemon zest/juice + dill + chives). GF using GF panko/cassava. Optional: carrot matchsticks, dill fronds.

recipes.title: Sour Cream Chicken Enchiladas
recipes.notes: GF/grain-free using Siete tortillas; sour cream sauce with butter, tapioca/arrowroot, cumin, broth, sour cream. Filling: shredded chicken, diced green chiles, Monterey Jack, sour cream. Top with salsa verde, cheese, optional jalapeño; bake until bubbly.

recipes.title: Sheet Pan Hot Honey Dijon Chicken
recipes.notes: Chicken thighs with baby potatoes and Brussels, seasoned with paprika/cumin/thyme/garlic. Hot honey Dijon sauce (honey, Dijon, ACV, lemon, thyme, cayenne optional). Roast then finish with sauce.

recipes.title: Sheet Pan Sausage and Sweet Piquante Peppers
recipes.notes: Sheet pan sausages with piquante peppers, cauliflower, walnuts. Tossed with basil pesto + lemon + olive oil; topped with goat cheese (omit for dairy-free) and basil.

recipes.title: Baked Salmon Sushi Bowls with Spicy Mayo
recipes.notes: Slow-roast salmon with avocado oil, coconut aminos, ginger/garlic, sesame oil; serve over brown rice (or cauliflower rice) with cucumber, avocado, green onions, nori strips, lime; spicy mayo (mayo, sesame oil, sriracha, rice vinegar, garlic).

recipes.title: Red Pepper Miso Buddha Bowls
recipes.notes: Roasted sweet potatoes; red pepper miso drizzle (roasted red pepper, coconut aminos, rice vinegar, sesame oil, miso, ginger). Components: cucumbers with rice vinegar/olive oil/black sesame; sautéed mushrooms + kale with lemon. Serve over grain (quinoa/farro/rice) with avocado.

recipes.title: Creamy Chicken Toscana
recipes.notes: Bacon + cassava-dredged chicken thighs, browned; sauce with broth, lemon, mustard, Italian seasoning, potato, kale, coconut milk. GF/grain-free; dairy-free if using coconut milk.

recipes.title: Balsamic Steak Salad with Creamy Gorgonzola Dressing
recipes.notes: Flank steaks marinated in olive oil + balsamic + mustard + garlic; served over arugula/spring mix with tomatoes and radishes; creamy Gorgonzola dressing (gorgonzola, garlic, olive oil, mustard, champagne vinegar, lemon juice, honey). GF/grain-free.

recipes.title: Pastrami Roast Chicken with Schmaltzy Onions & Dill
recipes.notes: Whole roast chicken on bed of red onions + garlic; rub of paprika, brown sugar, black pepper, salt, olive oil. Roast 50–65 min; finish with dill tossed into schmaltzy onions; serve with Dijon.

recipes.title: Slow-Roasted Piri-Piri(ish) Chicken with Crushed Potatoes & Aioli
recipes.notes: Whole chicken rubbed with chili paste (Fresno/serrano + garlic + tomato paste + paprika + oil), slow-roasted with Yukon Gold potatoes; serve with aioli from pan drippings/egg yolk/garlic/oil.

recipes.title: Spiced, Grilled & Swaddled Chicken Thighs with the Works
recipes.notes: Marinated boneless thighs (yogurt, lemon, oil, salt, smoked paprika, cumin, cinnamon, cayenne), grilled; quick-pickled red onions; garlic yogurt sauce; warm pitas; mint/cilantro; lettuce for wraps.

recipes.title: Strip Steaks au Poivre
recipes.notes: NY strip steaks salt/peppercorn-crusted; seared in cast iron, basted with butter/garlic/thyme; pan sauce with cognac (or broth) and heavy cream.

recipes.title: One-Pot Chicken & Schmaltzy Rice with Lemony Yog
recipes.notes: Skin-on thighs crisped, then cooked with basmati rice, onion, garlic, chili/serrano, lemon zest; finish with lemony yogurt (lemon zest/juice/garlic/yogurt) and pistachios/snap peas/parsley. Steam rice 10 min, fluff with lemon/pistachio/parsley/snap peas; serve chicken over rice, spoon yogurt on top.
